attributes.action: Allow Ukraine refugees to change drive licences with like for like permissions.
attributes.additional_details: As at 20 Jan 2023, we have taken in 192k Ukrainian refugees, a large number with skills falling on our shartage list, like courier + HGV drivers. The Gov. is spending millions per day, housing these folk in hotels and a number of them want to work and earn an honest days wage. Because of current law, when they exchange their driving licence to a UK one certain permissions are removed ie From having the ability to drive a manual vehicle + HGV, to be downgraded to only drive an automatic car.
attributes.background: Simply exchange Ukrainian refugees drivers licence's with like for like ie they have a manual licence upon entering and currently when they exchange their licences, they lose their ability to drive manual vehicles and also lose the ability to drive HGV vehicles.

rejection.details:
It is not the case that Ukranians are banned from driving manual cars when they come to the UK and there are rules that apply to all HGV drivers: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/driver-documents-required-for-international-road-haulage. 

We could accept a petition calling for changes to the above rules, for example exempting Ukrainian nationals from them.
